verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was <S%G1230>past<s%>, <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> mother of <S%G2385>James<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4539>Salome<s%>, had <S%G59>bought<s%> sweet <S%G759>spices<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G218>anoint<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3029>very<s%> early in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> at the <S%G393>rising<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G617>roll<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G617>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G3419>tomb<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G308>looked<s%>, they <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> was rolled <S%G617>away<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%>, they <S%G1492>saw<s%> a young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>side<s%>, <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in a <S%G4749>long<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>garment<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G1568>afraid<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1568>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1568>afraid<s%>: You <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%>: he is <S%G1453>risen<s%>; he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>: <S%G1492>behold<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> go your <S%G5217>way<s%>, <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he goes <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>: <S%G1563>there<s%> shall you <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, and <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%>; <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G846%G99999>they<s%> <S%G5156>trembled<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1611>amazed<s%>: <S%G2532>neither<s%> said <S%G2036>they<s%> any <S%G3762>thing<s%> to <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G1063>man<s%>; for they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%>.

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> Jesus was <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G4404>early<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, he <S%G5316>appeared<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%>, out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%>.
And she <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> them <S%G1565>that<s%> had <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, as they <S%G3996>mourned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2799>wept<s%>.

And <S%G2548>they<s%>, when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G2198>alive<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had been <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, believed <S%G569>not<s%>.

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3444>form<s%> to <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, as they <S%G4043>walked<s%>, and <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G68>country<s%>.
And <S%G2548>they<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> it to the <S%G3062>rest<s%>: <S%G3761>neither<s%> believed <S%G4100>they<s%> <S%G1565>them<s%>.

<S%G5305>Afterward<s%> he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> to the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> sat at <S%G345>food<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3679>upbraided<s%> them for <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hardness of <S%G4641>heart<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> them <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> after he had <S%G1453>risen<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, Go <S%G4198>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, and <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%>.

<S%G3588>He<s%> that <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G907>baptized<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that believes <S%G569>not<s%> shall be <S%G2632>damned<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> shall <S%G3877>follow<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G4100>believe<s%>; <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> shall they cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%>; they shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%>;

They shall take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3789>serpents<s%>; and <S%G2579>if<s%> they <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2286>deadly<s%> <S%G5100>thing<s%>, it shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G984>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>; they shall <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G732>sick<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>shall<s%> <S%G2573>recover<s%>.

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3303>then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, he was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, and <S%G2784>preached<s%> every <S%G3837>where<s%>, the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> working <S%G4903>with<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>, and <S%G950>confirming<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G1872>following<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
